#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<stdio.h>
#define max 500002
inline int inp()
{
    int noRead=0,neg=0;
	register char p=getchar_unlocked();
	for(;p<48 || p>57;p=getchar_unlocked())
	{	if(p=='-') neg=1;}
	while(p>32)
	{
		noRead = (noRead << 3) + (noRead << 1) + (p - '0');
		p=getchar_unlocked();
	}
	if(neg) noRead = -noRead;
	return noRead;
};
int main()
{
	unsigned long a[max];
	bool b[max]={0};
	long int i,j,t,n;
	for(i=1;i<max;i++)
	a[i]=1;
	for(i=2;i*2<=max;i++)
	{
		for(j=2*i;j<=max;j+=i)
		{
			a[j]*=i;
			if(a[j]>=10000)
			{
				a[j]=a[j]%10000;
				b[j]=1;
			}
		}
	}
	t=inp();
 	while(t--)
 	  {n=inp();
 	  if(b[n])
        {
            printf("%04lu\n",a[n]);
        }
        else {
            printf("%lu\n",a[n]);
        }
	}
	return 0;
}
